            <div class="Grid Grid--withGutter">
              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/PeterLShearman" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Peter Shearman</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/PeterLShearman">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">PeterLShearman</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Successful unsuccessful Labour Party candidate in Windsor GE17.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Eton Wick, South East

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url  u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">
</span>
      </div>


      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate">
        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText js-tooltip u-dir" dir="ltr" title="7:51 am - 10 Sep 2012">Joined September 2012</span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-birthdate u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--balloon Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Peter Shearman Retweeted Windsor Labour</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">So so proud of all of <a href="/windsorlabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="78288837"><s>@</s><b>windsorlabour</b></a> efforts these last few weeks. Most votes for <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> in Windsor since constituency reformed in '97...<a href="https://t.co/YhPKOSvX3o" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/windsorlabour/status/873017605979811840" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/windsorlabour/status/873017605979811840"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/windsorlabour/</span><span class="invisible">status/873017605979811840</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Peter Shearman added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/windsorlabour/status/873017605979811840" data-conversation-id="873017605979811840" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="873017605979811840" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="windsorlabour" data-user-id="78288837" href="/windsorlabour/status/873017605979811840" data-conversation-id="873017605979811840" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Windsor Labour</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>windsorlabour</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Well done to everyone involved with Windsor Labour Party during General Election 2017.  We got 22.8% of the vote to come 2nd.</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">And 'Straight Talking Honest Politics' requires us not to hide behind semantics but to be as clear as possible in what we say &amp; mean. 2/2</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Peter Shearman Retweeted (((Dan Hodges)))</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Corbyn technically didn't say he would wipe the debt. But we didn't stop that interpretation during the election. The criticism is just. 1/2<a href="https://t.co/nkmXDlg3vp" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/dpjhodges/status/889777542743425024" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/dpjhodges/status/889777542743425024"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/dpjhodges/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/889777542743425024</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Peter Shearman added,</p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2.4K</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Peter Shearman Retweeted BBC Sport</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Only 3 one-time Wimbledon champions since '93 (Krajicek/Ivanisevic/Hewitt)
Australian 6
French 10
US 7

Last outside big 4 was '02. Elite.<a href="https://t.co/PdbUBtJLhN" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcsport/status/886599252566323200" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcsport/status/886599252566323200"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcsport/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/886599252566323200</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">6</span>
  </span>

  </button>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Peter Shearman Retweeted Chris Cook</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is so important. For all the correct righteous anger over Grenfell the issue will likely be a series of small, linked failures. 1/n<a href="https://t.co/Ctld2JBsxl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/xtophercook/status/879712245474873344" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/xtophercook/status/879712245474873344"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/xtophercook/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/879712245474873344</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Peter Shearman added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/xtophercook/status/879712245474873344" data-conversation-id="879712245474873344" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="879712245474873344" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="xtophercook" data-user-id="96230203" href="/xtophercook/status/879712245474873344" data-conversation-id="879712245474873344" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Chris Cook</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>xtophercook</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">I've written, with help of colleagues <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="7780422"><s>@</s><b>innesbowen</b></span> and <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="253494285"><s>@</s><b>phill_kemp</b></span>, on why all these tower blocks are failing tests: <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-40418266" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-40418266"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-404182</span><span class="invisible">66</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Allen Simpson Retweeted Progress</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I'm joining the new <a href="/ProgressOnline" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="71000728"><s>@</s><b>ProgressOnline</b></a> 1000 club. If you can, you should too. Progress are more important than ever inside the Labour family.<a href="https://t.co/4zCObWwmGS" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/progressonline/status/878142138277519361" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/progressonline/status/878142138277519361"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/progressonline</span><span class="invisible">/status/878142138277519361</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Allen Simpson added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ProgressOnline/status/878142138277519361" data-conversation-id="878142138277519361" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="878142138277519361" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ProgressOnline" data-user-id="71000728" href="/ProgressOnline/status/878142138277519361" data-conversation-id="878142138277519361" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Progress</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ProgressOnline</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">After 21 years, Lord Sainsbury has decided to step back from party politics  and, as such, his funding of Progress will come to an end. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/GdnPolitics/status/878124984463351808" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/GdnPolitics/status/878124984463351808"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/GdnPolitics/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/878124984463351808</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Yvette Cooper Retweeted Paul Brand</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Q1 What did they promise DUP? Q2 What will they offer for each vote? Q3 Is abortion/lgbt a red line? Q4 How is this neutral on NI peace?<a href="https://t.co/j5OUDEVsKa" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/paulbranditv/status/873607983967739905" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/paulbranditv/status/873607983967739905"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/paulbranditv/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/873607983967739905</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Yvette Cooper added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

This <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2b07.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Down-pointing arrow" aria-label="Emoji: Down-pointing arrow" />sets out how reckless May has been on NI<a href="https://t.co/M020T9kcFh" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jackbern23/status/873277922429325314" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jackbern23/status/873277922429325314"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jackbern23/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/873277922429325314</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Peter Shearman added,</p>

  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Labour nearly doubled it's share of the vote in <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Runnymede</b></span> &amp; <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Weybridge</b></span> !   </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Peter Shearman Retweeted Tanmanjeet Singh Dhesi MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">One of many wonderful results for <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> last night. Congratulations <a href="/TanDhesi" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1865540413"><s>@</s><b>TanDhesi</b></a> just amazing.<a href="https://t.co/9y5lxeF0VY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tandhesi/status/873045631782100997" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tandhesi/status/873045631782100997"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tandhesi/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/873045631782100997</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Peter Shearman added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our wonderful team of <a href="/windsorlabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="78288837"><s>@</s><b>windsorlabour</b></a> volunteers worked exceptionally hard - over 20,000 leaflets delivered, c.3,500 doors knocked...</p>
</div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/Windsor?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Windsor</b></a> Hate equality, love austerity? Then vote <a href="/AdamAfriyie" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="22031058"><s>@</s><b>AdamAfriyie</b></a> tomorrow. Otherwise vote <a href="/PeterLShearman" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="815377650"><s>@</s><b>PeterLShearman</b></a> for investment in a fairer UK<a href="https://t.co/uBduoQ8PmC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/uBduoQ8PmC</a></p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Reply</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">If elected I've pledged to become an <a href="/hashtag/ArthritisChampion?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ArthritisChampion</b></a> with <a href="/ArthritisRUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="127505147"><s>@</s><b>ArthritisRUK</b></a> for the thousands of local people living with arthritis.</p>
</div>

RT  <a href="/hashtag/ForTheMany?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ForTheMany</b></a>.<a href="https://t.co/CBW9RV2ZIv" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CBW9RV2ZIv</a></p>

    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

  </div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2714.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Heavy check mark" aria-label="Emoji: Heavy check mark" />No more tuition fees <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2714.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Heavy check mark" aria-label="Emoji: Heavy check mark" />Housing benefit for under-21s <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2714.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Heavy check mark" aria-label="Emoji: Heavy check mark" />A renters' rights revolution. </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="869509926959427585" id="stream-item-tweet-869509926959427585" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;869509926959427585&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

RT  <a href="/hashtag/ForTheMany?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ForTheMany</b></a><a href="https://t.co/rQeGvkQo2z" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/rQeGvkQo2z</a></p>

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </div>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">

      <div class="stream-item-header">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Well transform education <a href="/hashtag/ForTheMany?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ForTheMany</b></a> with a new National Education Service. Here's our promise to learners. On board? RT <a href="https://t.co/4YVcYP5bz8" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/4YVcYP5bz8</a></p>

    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">Our National Education Service </div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description"> Stop cuts to school budgets  Reduce class sizes to under 30 for 5, 6 &amp; 7 year olds  Free school meals for primary kids  Restore EMA &amp; student grants  Scrap fees on courses for adults to re-train</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">An uncosted, unspecified cap, ruled out as unfair by her Health Sec just last week - our pensioners deserve better.<a href="https://t.co/qC2uuELd5y" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2017/may/22/theresa-may-u-turn-on-dementia-tax-cap-social-care-conservative-manifesto" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2017/may/22/theresa-may-u-turn-on-dementia-tax-cap-social-care-conservative-manifesto"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/society/2017/m</span><span class="invisible">ay/22/theresa-may-u-turn-on-dementia-tax-cap-social-care-conservative-manifesto</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">TODAY is your last chance to register to vote! Do it before midnight so that you can vote Labour on 8 June  <a href="https://t.co/5CsLmqeuNm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://gov.uk/register-to-vote" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://gov.uk/register-to-vote"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/register-to-vo</span><span class="invisible">te</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/GE2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></a><a href="https://t.co/1swPJQQi3n" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/1swPJQQi3n</a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">13</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-865110808266715136">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">

RT our pledges to workers <a href="https://t.co/cRdHXN5yWR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.labour.org.uk/index.php/workers/?utm_source=Twitter&amp;utm_campaign=PayCap" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.labour.org.uk/index.php/workers/?utm_source=Twitter&amp;utm_campaign=PayCap"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">labour.org.uk/index.php/work</span><span class="invisible">ers/?utm_source=Twitter&amp;utm_campaign=PayCap</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

    <span class="Icon Icon--smileRating1Fill UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Tweets not doing it for you?
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Hover over the profile pic and click the Following button to unfollow any account you're not interested in anymore.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--like">

  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--heart UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Say a lot with a little
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    When you see a Tweet you love, tap the heart  it lets  the person who wrote it know that you appreciate them.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--retweet">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--retweet UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Spread the word
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    The fastest way to share someone elses Tweet with your followers is with a Retweet. Tap the icon to send it instantly.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--reply">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--reply UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Join the conversation
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Add your thoughts about any Tweet with a Reply. Find a topic youre passionate about and jump right in.
  </p>
</div>



<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--trends">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--discover UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Learn the latest
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Get instant insight into what people are talking about right now.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--wtf">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--follow UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Get more of what you love
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Follow more accounts to get instant updates about topics you care about.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--search">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--search UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Find out what's happening
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    See the latest conversations about any topic instantly.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--moments">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--lightning UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Never miss a Moment
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Catch up instantly on the best stories happening as they unfold.
  </p>
</div>
